title: Tower of God: New World Tier List
description: This tier list is based on the opinions of experienced players and may not reflect everyone's experiences. It is also subject to change as the game evolves. The list is divided into S, A, B, and C tiers, with S tier being the highest and C tier being the lowest. The characters in each tier are ranked from best to worst. Please note that this is just a general tier list and the best team for you will depend on your playstyle and the specific content you are trying to clear.
